page.title: 01INTRODUCTION:BED'HM:HED'HM
page.content: Bedingham Hedenham & other parishes. Included here is 87% Bedingham,75% Hedenham & small parts of Woodton & 2 other parishes -hereafter called Bed'- hm:Hed'hm- a mainly open countryside of arable or mixed farming,but with built-up areas of the 3 named parish- es,Bedingham & Hedenham churches & Woodton's Methodist chapel.Some 30% of families have lived here for 2 or more generations.The farms,Hedenham Hall estate & several small businesses give some employment but most people travel elsewhere for work;consequently the majority of families own a car,but there are bus services for those able to walk up to 1/2 a mile or more,& Bedingham has a community minibus. Bedingham & Hedenham have small popu- lations & so each has a Parish Meeting & with other parishes,come under the eagis of South Norfolk D.C.
